00021 using Gtk;
00022 
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Threading;
00025 
00026 using Niry;
00027 using Niry.Utils;
00028 using Niry.Network;
00029 
00030 using NyFolder;
00031 using NyFolder.Utils;
00032 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00033 using NyFolder.PluginLib;
00034 
00035 namespace NyFolder {
00036     public class NyFolderExit : Exception {
00038         public NyFolderExit (string msg) : base(msg) {}
00040         public NyFolderExit (string msg, Exception inner) : base(msg, inner) {}
00041     }
00042 
00044     public sealed class NyFolderApp : INyFolder {
00045         // ============================================
00046         // PUBLIC Events
00047         // ============================================
00049         public event BlankEventHandler LoginDialogStarted = null;
00051         public event BlankEventHandler LoginDialogClosed = null;
00053         public event BlankEventHandler MainWindowStarted = null;
00055         public event BlankEventHandler MainWindowClosed = null;
00057         public event BlankEventHandler UserLogout = null;
00059         public event BlankEventHandler UserLogin = null;
00060 
00061         // ============================================
00062         // PRIVATE STATIC Members
00063         // ============================================
00065         public static bool Restart = false;
00066 
00067         // ============================================
00068         // PRIVATE Members
00069         // ============================================
00070         private GUI.Dialogs.Login loginDialog = null;
00071         private GUI.Window mainWindow = null;
00072         private UserInfo myInfo = null;
00073 
00074         // ============================================
00075         // PUBLIC Constructors
00076         // ============================================
00078         public NyFolderApp() {
00079         }
00080 
00081         // ============================================
00082         // PUBLIC Methods
00083         // ============================================
00084         public void Initialize() {
00085         }
00086 
00088         public void Run() {
00089             // Start With Login Dialog
00090             loginDialog = new GUI.Dialogs.Login();
00091             if (LoginDialogStarted != null) LoginDialogStarted(loginDialog);
00092             loginDialog.Response += new ResponseHandler(OnLoginResponse);
00093         }
00094 
00096         public void Quit() {
00097             Restart = false;
00098 
00099             // Quitting Event
00100             if (loginDialog != null && LoginDialogClosed != null) {
00101                 LoginDialogClosed(loginDialog);
00102                 loginDialog.Hide();
00103                 loginDialog.Destroy();
00104             }
00105             loginDialog = null;
00106             
00107             if (mainWindow != null && MainWindowClosed != null) {
00108                 MainWindowClosed(mainWindow);
00109                 mainWindow.Hide();
00110                 mainWindow.Destroy();
00111             }
00112             mainWindow = null;
00113 
00114             // Do User Logout
00115             if (UserLogout != null) UserLogout(myInfo);
00116             Protocol.MyInfo.Logout();
00117             this.myInfo = null;
00118         }
00119 
00121         public void Logout() {
00122             // Destroy Main Window
00123             mainWindow.Destroy();
00124             Quit();
00125 
00126             Restart = true;
00127             throw(new NyFolderExit("Logout"));
00128         }
00129 
00130         // ============================================
00131         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00132         // ============================================
00133         private void OnLoginResponse (object sender, ResponseArgs args) {
00134             if (args.ResponseId == ResponseType.Ok) {
00135                 DoLogin((GUI.Dialogs.Login) sender);
00136                 if (myInfo != null) RunMainWindow();
00137             } else {
00138                 Gtk.Application.Quit();
00139             }
00140         }
00141 
00142         private void OnLogout (object sender) {
00143             Logout();
00144         }
00145 
00146         private void OnQuit (object sender) {
00147             Quit();
00148         }
00149 
00150         // ============================================
00151         // PRIVATE Methods
00152         // ============================================
00153         private void RunMainWindow() {
00154             // Start NyFolder Window
00155             mainWindow = new GUI.Window();
00156             mainWindow.Quit += new BlankEventHandler(OnQuit);
00157             mainWindow.Logout += new BlankEventHandler(OnLogout);
00158 
00159             Debug.Log("Logged In as {0}", myInfo.Name);
00160             Debug.Log("Shared Path: {0}", Paths.UserSharedDirectory(myInfo.Name));
00161 
00162             // Add GUI Glue
00163             new GUI.Glue.FolderManager(mainWindow);
00164             new GUI.Glue.NetworkManager(mainWindow);
00165             new GUI.Glue.ProtocolManager(mainWindow);
00166 
00167             // NyFolder Window ShowAll
00168             mainWindow.ShowAll();
00169 
00170             // Start 'Main Window Started' Event
00171             if (MainWindowStarted != null) MainWindowStarted(mainWindow);
00172         }
00173 
00174         private void DoLogin (GUI.Dialogs.Login dialog) {
00175             if (dialog.ValidateInput() == false)
00176                 return;
00177 
00178             if ((myInfo = dialog.CheckLogin()) != null) {
00179                 if (UserLogin != null) UserLogin(myInfo);
00180                 if (LoginDialogClosed != null) LoginDialogClosed(loginDialog);
00181                 dialog.Destroy();
00182                 loginDialog = null;
00183             }
00184         }
00185 
00186         // ============================================
00187         // PUBLIC Properties
00188         // ============================================
00190         public GUI.Window MainWindow {
00191             get { return(this.mainWindow); }
00192         }
00193 
00195         public GUI.Dialogs.Login LoginDialog {
00196             get { return(this.loginDialog); }
00197         }
00198 
00200         public UserInfo MyInfo {
00201             get { return(this.myInfo); }
00202         }
00203     }
00204 }
